title: Monoprice Amplifier Speaker (611940)
features: Built-in compressor: Tighten your input signal for a puncher and more defined sound using the built-in compressor. It features both an on/off switch, as well as a variable gain knob.
Main input: Plug in your bass using a standard 1/4in instrument cable.
Headphone output: Plug in a pair of headphones to the headphone output to disable the speaker, so you can practice at any time, day or night, without disturbing the neighbors.
XLR DI output: The built-in Direct Injection (D.I) XLR output makes it easy to connect to house PAs or mixers, while eliminating noise and making it easier to control the tone.
Auxiliary input: The 3.5mm auxiliary input allows you to plug in an audio player, so you can play along with prerecorded tracks.
description: Featuring a 10in speaker and 40 watts of clean power, the Stage Right 40-Watt 1x10 Bass Combo Amp is ideal for enthusiasts looking for both power and portability. Practical and versatile, this 40-watt bass amp can be used for both home practice and live stage performances. The built-in Direct Injection XLR output makes it easy to connect to house PAs or mixers, while eliminating noise and making it easier to control the tone. The rugged, durable cabinet features metal caps on the corners and a textured, professional looking finish. A built-in compressor and variable midrange crossover frequency allows you to dial in precisely the right sound for each song. The 3.5mm auxiliary input allows you to plug in an audio player, so you can play along with prerecorded tracks, while a 3.5mm headphone output allows you to practice at any time, day or night, without disturbing the neighbors.
